title: For Vladimir Fans! :D

embed.description: Yeeey! I finally finished this painting after so many days xP Prints and other products also available on: Redbubble - www.redbub... Vladimir, the crimson reaper - Portrait fanart

body:
Hi all!
Once again I'm posting another fanart portrait for the Lol community.
I have been working on it on my free time during this month.

{{champion:8}}  Even though Vlad would like you better if you are negative, try not to be xD
Just kidding, all feedback is welcome as always :)

replies.body: Looks Great man. Vlad was my first favorite champion :D

Thank you so much! :D 
He is still my favorite after all this time xD
Come on guys, lets all B-
